IoT and Data Science Intern at Salzburg Research

Intern in Data Science and IoT, Salzburg Research Summer 2017 Project: Create a self-driving slot-car which beats humans. Project on github. • Created a reactionary algorithm controlling the slot-car using data from a custom-built feedback loop. Beats humans. • Set up a Computer Vision and Reinforcement Learning implementation.

Lead Data Scientist at Mint AI

Mint AI’s Mission: Provide data analytic tools for value investors through an educational and user-friendly chatbot. • Developed and implemented Machine Learning methods to assist value investors.

Software Engineering and Virtual Reality Intern at VRVis

Project: Create a virtual reality simulator to train office workers and firefighters. • Took initiative to develop and implement a realistic real-time simulation method for fire in a closed room.
